Posts.Content: Thanks Ladies, I am a worrier and last time the woman at the breast clinic was really off with me cause I smoke that's all she went on about! having an ultrasound on one breast put me at ease a little but I just had a niggling feeling xx
Posts.Title: 2nd armpit lump

Posts.Content: Looking for some advice please, I found a lump under my left armpit last months and on inspection doctor found a lump in my left breast and sent me to break clinic, I had an ultrasound scan on the left breast only and consultant said it was fine, a month later I now have a hard none painful lump under my right armpit and I don't know what to do, I want to go back to the doctor but I don't want to waste the professionals time as I was left feeling I had last time, my Grandma had breast cancer and so I am aware of checking etc
Posts.Title: 2nd armpit lump
